title: CUTN Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 02 Senior Project Associate Posts
description: The Central University of Tamil Nadu (CUTN) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 02 Senior Project Associate Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, M.Sc. Nursing and Ph.D. candidates can apply for the CUTN Recruitment 2025 . The interseted applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age...
